product_name: Zippo Camping Is In-Tents! Windproof Lighter
long_description: With fun graphics and reliable performance, the Zippo Camping Is In-Tents! Windproof Lighter will go with you wherever you roam. It will start a campfire or light your cook stove for years to come.
short_description: With fun graphics and reliable performance, the Zippo Camping Is In-Tents! Windproof Lighter will go with you wherever you roam. It will start a campfire or light your cook stove for years to come.
